an5.9:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu agaravo appatisso cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:1.3: Assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:1.4: Ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:1.5: Anottappi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:1.6: Kusito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:1.7: Duppanno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu agaravo appatisso cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:2.3: Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:2.4: Hirima, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:2.5: Ottappi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:2.6: Araddhaviriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:2.7: Pannava, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.9:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso na cavati, patitthati saddhamme”ti.
